title: Contributing
text: Make sure GitHub account. familar git GitHub, take look http://happygitwithr.com/ get started. Submit post issue, assuming one already exist. Clearly describe issue, including steps reproduce bug, justification proposed improvement. Fork repository GitHub make copy repository account. use line shell terminal: git clone git@github.com:-username/rcompendiumtest9.git

title: Contributing
text: Edit files, save often, make commits logical units, commit indicates one concept Follow style guide. Make sure write good commit messages. Make sure added necessary tests code changes. Run tests using devtools::check() assure nothing else accidentally broken. need help unsure anything, post update issue.

Follow code style guide. Write good commit message.

title: My title
text: MS Word document, following modifications must made ‚ÄòModify Style‚Äô menu: Set font color ‚Äòwhite‚Äô (rather ‚ÄòAutomatic‚Äô). Select smallest font size (8 rather 11). Select ‚ÄòPage break ‚Äô ‚ÄòLine Page Breaks‚Äô tab. Set line spacing ‚ÄòExactly‚Äô ‚Äò1 pt‚Äô ‚ÄòIndents Spacing‚Äô tab. tweaks, ‚ÄòHeading 5‚Äô style longer format heading level 5. Instead insert small white (, thus, invisible) line followed page break. Now knit doc, edit styles resulting docx file. rename ‚Äòtemplate‚Äô use yml: Don‚Äôt forget line numbers JAS! Headings bold, underline, nothing. Arial Narrow 10pt tables. See information: http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com/articles_docx.html

title: The Title of the Project
text: analysis directory contains: üìÅ paper: Quarto source document manuscript. Includes code reproduce figures tables generated analysis. also rendered version, paper.docx, suitable reading (code replaced figures tables file) üìÅ data: Data used analysis. üìÅ figures: Plots illustrations üìÅ supplementary-materials: Supplementary materials including notes documents prepared collected analysis.

what: How to run in your browser or download and run locally
title: The Title of the Project
text: research compendium developed using statistical programming language R. work compendium, need installed computer R software optionally RStudio Desktop. can download compendium zip URL: master.zip. unzipping: - open .Rproj file RStudio - run devtools::install() ensure packages analysis depends (also listed DESCRIPTION file). - finally, open analysis/paper/paper.Rmd knit produce paper.docx, run rmarkdown::render("analysis/paper/paper.qmd") R console

title: Print a message ‚Äî print_msg
text: function prints simple message. demo function show good practices writing documenting R function. delete function forget delete corresponding test file tests/testthat/test-demo.R used new_package(test = TRUE).

title: Print a message ‚Äî print_msg
text: x character length 1. Default 'Hello world'.

title: Print a message ‚Äî print_msg
text: value x (result assigned variable).

title: Print a message ‚Äî print_msg
code: print_msg() #> Hello world  print_msg("Bonjour le monde") #> Bonjour le monde   x <- print_msg("Bonjour le monde") #> Bonjour le monde  x #> [1] "Bonjour le monde"
